name: Tank Skirmish 3D
description:
Tank Skirmish 3D is a fast-paced two player tank game where players aim to destroy each other. The game features a diverse range of weapons, from the basic shell and missile, to deadly shadows that can pass through walls and destroy a tank with a single touch. Most maps feature fully destructible walls and bridges, which can be blasted apart by weaponry or simply driven through.
Enjoy the sheer pleasure of destruction in Tank Skirmish 3D!

Controls Player 1:
Move Forward: W
Move Backwards: S
Turn Left: A
Turn Right: D
Fire/Shoot: Space / ~ Player 2:
Move Forward: Up Arrow
Move Backwards: Down Arrow
Turn Left: Left Arrow
Turn Right: Right Arrow
Fire/Shoot: Enter / Return Other Controls

Top-down View: 1
Third Person View: 2
Restart/Next Map: R
Pause/Menu: Backspace

Note that active development on Tank Skirmish 3D has ceased, and hence no major updates featuring additional maps, powerups or game modes (such as LAN multiplayer) will be released. However, minor updates will still be released to fix any critical bugs or other minor issues.
